```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(shiny)
library(shinyjs)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, fig.width = 5.5, fig.height = 3.4)
```


```{r gather_pkg_info, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

setwd(params$cwd)

pkg_info <- dbSelect(glue(
  "SELECT *
  FROM package
  WHERE name ='{params$package}'"
))

```

**Maintainer:** `r pkg_info$maintainer`

**License:** `r pkg_info$license`
